publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2705 Dr Jean Turner: Morgan Jamieson, National Clinical Lead for Children and Young People’s Health—That the Parliament congratulates Morgan Jamieson on his appointment as the first National Clinical Lead for Children and Young People’s Health in Scotland and notes that, as a paediatric cardiac surgeon working in Yorkhill Hospital, he has extensive experience in providing expert advice to NHS boards as they promote child health and redesign children’s health services, mindful of the special attention that needs to be focused on the health of expectant mothers and children to help formulate good dietary habits for future generations.

S2M-2705 Morgan Jamieson, National Clinical Lead for Children and Young People’s Health (lodged on 15 April 2005) Karen Gillon*, Robin Harper*, Eleanor Scott*, Patrick Harvie*, Robert Brown*, Chris Ballance*

S2M-2705 Morgan Jamieson, National Clinical Lead for Children and Young People’s Health (lodged on 15 April 2005) Jackie Baillie*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mary Scanlon*, Pauline McNeill*, John Swinburne*
S2M-2705 Morgan Jamieson, National Clinical Lead for Children and Young People’s Health (lodged on 15 April 2005) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-2705 Morgan Jamieson, National Clinical Lead for Children and Young People’s Health (lodged on 15 April 2005) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-2705 Morgan Jamieson, National Clinical Lead for Children and Young People’s Health (lodged on 15 April 2005) Trish Godman*
S2M-2705 Morgan Jamieson, National Clinical Lead for Children and Young People’s Health (lodged on 15 April 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2705 Morgan Jamieson, National Clinical Lead for Children and Young People’s Health (lodged on 15 April 2005) Linda Fabiani*
